metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3896 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Divide By Zero in vim/vim from 9.0.1367-1 to 9.0.1367-3

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-athena - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-common - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-gtk3 - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-gui-common - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-motif - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-nox - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-runtime - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
vim-tiny - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
xxd - 2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.0.1672-1ubuntu2').
